text: Salaam Bombay! ('greetings Bombay!') is a 1988 Indian drama movie, in Hindi language. It was directed by first time director Mira Nair and starring Shafiq Syed, Raghuvir Yadav, Anita Kanwar, Nana Patekar, Chanda Sharma. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1989. ==Related pages== *Salaam ==Other websites== * * * Category:1988 crime movies Category:1988 drama movies Category:Indian movies Category:British crime drama movies Category:French crime movies Category:French drama movies Category:Canadian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Mira Nair
title: Salaam Bombay!
